title: Mathematics Internet Application Education Using Smartphones

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone usage skills and understanding of middle school mathematics concepts
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented education utilizing smartphones as the primary tool in PC-unavailable settings.

learning_goals: Can independently utilize three or more smartphone-based mathematics applications
Can design mathematics teaching-learning plans integrated with internet resources
Can analyze science/mathematics data accessible in mobile environments and convert them into instructional materials

resources: Free Math App Compatible with Android/iOS
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
